sentences.english: In the next place, the university students should also display main function in the course of relationship adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 首先要发挥高校政工干部在调适关系中的主导性作用。

sentences.english: Objective To understand mental health of political cadres.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解公安政工干部心理健康状况。

sentences.english: Psychological quality is one of the basic qualities that political work cadres should possess.
sentences.chinese: 良好的心理素质是政工干部做好思想政治工作的前提。

sentences.english: Such as municipal works in public places on the sun roof .
sentences.chinese: 如市政工程上的公共场所的阳光顶棚。

sentences.english: All this will ensure rapid and sound development of enterprise political working staff.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样，才能保证企业政工干部队伍迅速健康成长。

sentences.english: It is demanded by the progress of the times to strengthen the team construction of administrative cadres in higher vocational colleges.
sentences.chinese: 加强高职院校政工干部队伍建设是时代发展的要求。

sentences.english: Project change is the key factor of affecting the municipal engineering construction project cost.
sentences.chinese: 工程变更是影响市政工程建设项目造价的关键因素。

sentences.english: The municipal government will launch an extensive public works program next year.
sentences.chinese: 市政府将于明年开始一项大规模的市政工程计划。

sentences.english: These water supply and drainage systems outside the building are grouped into civil works.
sentences.chinese: 这些室外的给水和排水被归纳为市政工程。

sentences.english: The bank is also exposed to suspect municipal projects.
sentences.chinese: 该银行还参与了不可信的市政工程。

sentences.english: Examples of the way army political leaders put these theories into practice come readily to mind.
sentences.chinese: 军队政工领导人把这些理论运用于实践的例子很多。

sentences.english: Article 2. The competent department of postal services under the State Council shall administer postal services throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 第二条国务院邮政主管部门管理全国邮政工作。
